attributes.action: next elections add an option to vote "no confidence in any government party"
attributes.additional_details: The recent local government elections have had a very poor turn out at most in areas around 40% in other areas though this is much lower, to me this is a very large proportion of the population unhappy with all government parties, the government is there as public servants to run the country as the people want, the government parties needs to listen and to change
attributes.background: To listen to the people fully an make radical changes to government parties an make the government unite the majority of the country to get it strong and solid again (i understand you cannot make everyone happy) but 70% plus of the population unhappy something is wrong very wrong !

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575629
